tool_description: Exports the formatted resume to multiple file formats while preserving visual design elements and ensuring compatibility across different platforms and systems.

quality_settings.description: Export quality level: high, medium, or optimized

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide formatted resume content for export.
No export formats specified: Provide at least one export format.
Unsupported export format: One or more requested formats are not supported.
Invalid quality settings: Use one of [high, medium, optimized].
Export processing failed: Unable to generate one or more requested formats.
usage: Provide formatted resume and specify desired export formats. Optionally set quality settings, ATS versions, and file naming preferences. Returns export status and file information.

generated_files.description: List of successfully generated file formats

file_sizes.description: File sizes for each generated format

quality_preserved.description: Whether visual quality was preserved across formats

export_warnings.description: Any warnings or notes about format-specific limitations
